meta_description: An application to merge, split and add images to PDFs.
welcome_message: Welcome to PDF merger. This is an application where you may quickly upload, organize, split and/or merge your files. Using our tool is fast, secure and safe! None of your data is uploaded to the cloud - everthing happens locally on your machine.
drag_or_select: Drag files here, or click to select files
click_select: Click to select files to upload
no_files_error: Could not download - no files were uploaded.
upload_some_files: Upload some files to get started!
already_uploaded_error_message: A file with the same name has already been uploaded
is_existing: is the name of an existing file. Duplicate file names are not allowed.
upload_errors: One or more files did not successfully upload.
